column2:
"OK! Everyone's here! You ready?
Let's get this party started! Raise the roof!
We're ARKS！"

"You guys are the bomb! Thank you!
I'm gonna pass the mic to these three now!"
"Atten-tion!"
"Stand up!"
"Blast off!"
"Warping through space and time! 'Going' full speed ahead!"
"Ours is a story that no one has ever known!"
"With our hearts racing, 'Diving' into the future!"
"Once we step out of the Gate, it begins! Ultimate 'Adventure'!"
"And when the going gets tough, who do we remember?"
"That's right, our reliable companions!"
"With Photons overflowing!"
"Onward!!"
"Sprinting on ahead, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Reaching out and grabbing hold, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Aiming for the farthest corners of space"
"Exhausted and Battered! Fighting Dreamer!"
"But we keep on fighting! Sailing Together!"
"We'll rise as many times as it takes! Because we’re ARKS!"
"The tears we've shed will always shine, 'Hurry up' tomorrow!"
"This is the stage that connects our dreams! We fear nothing!"
"These glowing dreams within our hearts 'Jump up' together!"
"Awaken, with minds as one! 'Our Power' is invincible!"
"Even when our goal is invisible, we fix our gaze ahead!"
"See, those billowing winds against our faces!"
"Show us the way ahead!"
"Onward!!"
"Sprinting on ahead, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Reaching out and grabbing hold, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Aiming for the farthest corners of space!"
"Exhausted and Battered! Fighting Dreamer!"
"But we keep on fighting! Sailing Together!"
"We'll rise as many times as it takes! Because we’re ARKS!"
"Sprinting on ahead, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Reaching out and grabbing hold, together! Ready-Set-Go!"
"Aiming for the farthest corners of space!"
"Exhausted and Battered! Fighting Dreamer!"
"But we keep on fighting! Sailing Together!"
"We'll rise as many times as it takes! Because we’re ARKS!"
"We’re ARKS!"

"Takenobu Mitsuyoshi
Choreography:Suzuki Papaya"
